meanings.definition: To remove an amino group from a molecule.
meanings.sent1: The scientist deaminized the compound to study its structure.
meanings.sent2: She carefully deaminized the protein to analyze its components.
meanings.sent3: The potion deaminized the magical elixir, causing unexpected results.
meanings.sent4: His words deaminized her confidence, leaving her feeling exposed.
meanings.sent5: The enzyme deaminized the substrate, transforming it into a new product.

meanings.definition: Having had an amino group removed.
meanings.sent1: The deaminized molecule showed different properties under the microscope.
meanings.sent2: The deaminized protein exhibited altered behavior in the experiment.
meanings.sent3: The deaminized fruit had a peculiar taste that surprised the chef.
meanings.sent4: Her deaminized hair color attracted attention at the party.
meanings.sent5: The deaminized solution glowed under the UV light, indicating a successful reaction.
